TopicTitle: Mod that randomizes Kerbol system when starting a new carreer?

Articles.Content:
Well since it is all "the same" nowadays and I have already almost idealized rockets in my stock each new carreer is exactly similar.

 

I wonder, is there any mod that "randomizes" the kerbol system when you start a new career? (And then changes the world/first/contracts too, so that if gilly is suddenly a moon of kerbin and mun part of the jool system, you do not require to go to the mun before getting most contracts).
yes. just was adopted by LGG.
